content: {"name": "Heaven\u2019s Bounty Quakertown First Church of the Brethren", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients must be residents of the Quakertown Community School District\nand bring photo ID/proof of residency when signing up for the first time. \nClients are welcomed to visit once every four weeks and should arrive before 11:30 am in order to get done by 12:00.", "email": "", "url": "https://quakertowncoborg.wordpress.com/heavens-bounty-food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "455 Trumbauersville Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Quakertown", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "18951", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.424864, "longitude": -75.3604837}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 536-1317", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
